attributes.action: Allow Tender city LTD become the sole regulatory body for all tradesmen
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Tender City LTD will ensure that all work carried out by registered members is;
 1. Completed to the clients specification
2. Work completed on time, on budget and a with high level of workmanship
3. All warranties being honoured.

We at Tender City LTD will regulate all tradesmen and provide this service free of charge to the client. We will also honour all warranties regardless if the tradesman is still trading and also compensate clients if needed. We will also refund any monies in any case of client absconding.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
